entry.title: Onion routing strawman proposal
entry.summary: A developer Rusty has shared a test onion routing code on GitHub. The code has been pushed in an acceptable format and is fixed at 3840 bytes. Each node decrypts and removes the tail entry, then prepends padding. The code includes basic encryption methods such as AES128 counter mode, HMAC using SHA256, and Bitcoin's EC with ECDH. Rusty has requested a crypto review of the code.
